Reviews.Title: One for the Wife!
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my wife to take to Argentina on her trip.  The Wi-Fi feature made it worthwhile.  She loves it...and if the wife is happy, everyone is happy.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Joy420
Reviews.Content: Got this for my trip to Amsterdam and it was perfect. Great features, and it makes manual settings relatively easy. I suggest getting to know it and practicing with the settings. THe touch screen can be a little... touchy, but you can turn it off. The wifi feature is nice, and if you download the Samsung camera app to your smartphone, you can send pix right to your phone even without wifi - as long as they're close to each other. Great zoom, and great quality photos.If you're going to be doing the tourist thing anywhere, I highly recommend this - Hakuba USA Inc Dns629 Neck Strap For Use With Digital Camera: Hakuba USA Inc Dns629 Neck Strap For Use With Digital Camera

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Rolando De S
Reviews.Content: the camera is nice and good. ideal size.good zoom, user-friendly menu.The kit bag is large and comes many accessories.

Reviews.Title: Extra kit
Reviews.Author: Alfred Hentze "alfred"
Reviews.Content: The 8gb memory stick that came with the kit didn't work, (it is the cheapest chinese thing), it says it comes with a USB, it is not, it is a thing to insert the memory stick, the camera case is not like the one on the picture here, it is a bigger case to put everything inside, I was expecting a "case for the camera" as shown here. I don't care for this big case, I will have to buy a case just for the camera, About the camera I am ok, I am happy with it, just have to learn how to use properly.  thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture Detailed Images in Low Light situations with a 14PM BSI CMOS Sensor
Share your Best Photos Instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi
18x Optical Zoom
3.0 TFT LCD Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB250F/WB200F Smart Digital Camera 14.2 MP 18x Optical Zoom Wi-Fi, Cobalt Black + 8GB SDHC Class 10 Memory + Carrying Case + Mini Tripod Kit + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
